column4: and I can't figure out how to install the OpenGL header files
which is unfortunate because the engine is quite capable
this is about my, ahhh, hmmm, 7th distro since a year ago
looks good and there is a lot of packages available
but i can't seem to install the OpenGL development header files that I need
but I know that other people have gotten it to work
i don't know, i just figured that there would be someone here that does development in OpenGL
i'm sure you guys wouldn't be too happy if I was working on a Windows DirectX engine :D
but since I switched Ubuntu I can't program anymore
I was going to do a few bug fixes and then work on audio today
but I can't even compile the engine
